title: Complete Professional Certification
description: Earn the Project Management Professional (PMP) certification to advance my career in project management and increase my marketability.

notifications.message: One month left to complete your PMP certification!
Final week to finish your certification - you've got this!

title: Run a Half Marathon
description: Train for and complete a half marathon to improve my fitness and mental resilience. Target time under 2 hours.

notifications.message: Two weeks until race day - time to taper your training!

title: Save Emergency Fund
description: Build an emergency fund covering 6 months of expenses for financial security and peace of mind.

notifications.message: Monthly check-in: Review your emergency fund progress

title: Learn Spanish Conversational Level

title: Plan European Vacation
description: Organize a 2-week trip to Europe including itinerary, bookings, and budget planning for an unforgettable experience.
